author: michal
msg: Destination directory for tlds files were created inside src area.

author: michal
msg: war:war goal is simply packaging (using ant jar task) the directory created by war:webapp goal.
This change simplifies the customization of processing and removes code duplication.
Fix for Maven-481 - tlds deps can be bundled in wars

author: vmassol
msg: - Fixed Changes report which was not showing up correctly (blank page)
- Fixed MAVEN-538: report generation failing when no errors.

author: evenisse
msg: Fixed MAVEN-493. I register reports only if source, test,... exists.
So, corresponding entrys in menu will appear only if reports are registered.
